title: Edgewater Landing close to shores and downtown!!!
map_address: 1330-1350 West Blvd. near Detroit ave- Clifton Blvd
posting_body: Our apartments go fast at our community!
We are taking on applications for our studio suites, one-bedroom suites and two-bedrooms suites.
Availability upcoming during the summer and fall.
Call and schedule your tour now to submit your application for approval.

Edgewater Landing features totally updated suites located in the city of Cleveland just two blocks away from the shores of Lake Erie and Edgewater Park, not more than a five-minute drive to all that downtown has to offer.
This community is nestled amongst the historic, beautiful homes and mansions of the distinctive West Boulevard.
We also offer convenient online rental payment and maintenance requests.
Visit Edgewater Landing today and we know you will agree - it is just what you are looking for!
You will enjoy the conveniences of:
Rooftop fitness center and party room
Easy access to RTA bus lines and major highways
Online rental payments and maintenance requests
